      • prepareManager

        public static void prepareManager(org.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                  GameActivity activity,
                  org.andengine.engine.camera.Camera camera,
                  org.andengine.opengl.vbo.VertexBufferObjectManager vbom)
        Prepare manager.
        Parameters:
        engine - the engine
        activity - the activity
        camera - the camera
        vbom -

        We use this method at beginning of game loading, to prepare Resources Manager properly, setting all needed parameters, so we can latter access them from different classes (eg. scenes)
